metadata.Title: CVE-2020-28241 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
libmaxminddb before 1.4.3 has a heap-based buffer over-read in dump_entry_data_list in maxminddb.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-28241` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmaxminddb0 - 1.4.2-0ubuntu1.20.04.1
mmdb-bin - 1.4.2-0ubuntu1.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmaxminddb package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4.2-0ubuntu1.20.04.1').
